Articles.Content: Rotate and build them int he Spaceplane Hangar. No launch tower, no pad to fall off of, and the Kerbylon launchpad works better on it!
Its not the same feeling... and a lot more labor intensive.
Build in VAB and then transfer to SPH, I would say.

Yep, definitely transfer from VAB to HAB. I built a ship to visit Minmus today, and tried it in the HAB just for kicks. It was a pain. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) The way symmetry works in there is different, so I had to place several things by hand. It worked! But, only because I used up most of my awesome. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Zephram, I really like your signature! haha. Tell your VCR he\'s go on that alarm. Same for the 1201. Same type. You\'re go.
